pr_title: Remove java stack trace log to fix list miss file status perf

timeline.message: Remove java stack trace log to fix list miss file status perf

timeline.author: LuQQiu

replies.bodyText:
@LuQQiu They print the stack trace in 2.x as follows:
warn(CharSequence message, Throwable t)
         Logs a CharSequence at the WARN level including the stack trace of the Throwable t passed as parameter.`

And for 1.x as follows:
warn(Object message, Throwable t)
          Log a message with the WARN level including the stack trace of the Throwable t passed as parameter.

Both of them throw the stack trace?
replies.author: HelloHorizon

replies.bodyText: In the logs themselves, do the stacks shows up for both versions?
replies.author: gpang

replies.bodyText: The stacks are not showing up in the previous version but for the latest version.
replies.author: HelloHorizon

replies.bodyText: @gpang - based on the comment from @HelloHorizon , this should be good to go - please confirm.
replies.author: rastogiasr
